casebody.data:
SPHERE DRAKE INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. ALL AMERICAN LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 04-1869. United States Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Submitted July 2, 2004. Decided July 21, 2004. James I. Rubin, Butler, Rubin, Saltarelli & Boyd, Chicago, IL, for Plaintiff-Appellee. Griswold L. Ware, Vurdelja & Heaphy, Chicago, IL, Andrew S. Amer, Simpson, Thacher & Bartlett, New York, NY, for Defendant-Appellant.

Before EASTERBROOK, KANNE, and EVANS, Circuit Judges.

Order

The judgment is affirmed, substantially for the reasons given in the district court’s thorough opinion.
